#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

long long  mod= 1000000007;
 void square(long long F[2][2])
{
        long long x =  ((F[0][0]*F[0][0])%mod + (F[0][1]*F[1][0])%mod)%mod;
        long long y =  ((F[0][0]*F[0][1])%mod + (F[0][1]*F[1][1])%mod)%mod;
        long long z = (( F[1][0]*F[0][0])%mod + (F[1][1]*F[1][0])%mod)%mod;
        long long w =  ((F[1][0]*F[0][1])%mod + (F[1][1]*F[1][1])%mod)%mod;
 
        F[0][0] = x;
        F[0][1] = y;
        F[1][0] = z;
        F[1][1] = w;
        
}

void powers(long long F[2][2])
{   
    
    long long M[2][2]={{1,1},{1,0}};
     
        long long x =  ((F[0][0]*M[0][0])%mod + (F[0][1]*M[1][0])%mod)%mod;
        long long y=  ((F[0][0]*M[0][1])%mod + (F[0][1]*M[1][1])%mod)%mod;
        long long z =  ((F[1][0]*M[0][0])%mod + (F[1][1]*M[1][0])%mod)%mod;
        long long w =  ((F[1][0]*M[0][1])%mod + (F[1][1]*M[1][1])%mod)%mod;
 
        F[0][0] = x;
        F[0][1] = y;
        F[1][0] = z;
        F[1][1] = w;
    
}

void tiles(long long n,long long f[2][2])
{   
    
    if(n<=1)
    return ;
        
        tiles(n/2,f);
         
          square(f);
    
          if(n%2!=0)
           powers(f);
           
           
}

int main()
{ ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	long long n;
	cin>>t;
	    while(t--)
	    {	
	    cin>>n;
	    long long f[2][2]={{1,1},{1,0}};
	   tiles(n,f);
	    cout<<f[0][0]<<endl;
	        }
return 0;	
}
